languages.text: "Будь готов, Абеляр — нас ждет тяжкое испытание".
"Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."
languages.original_text: "Будь готов, Абеляр — нас ждет тяжкое испытание".

traits.locale_text: "Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."
"Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."
"Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."
"Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."
"Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."

languages.text: “做好准备，阿贝拉德。咱们有场硬仗要打。”
languages.original_text: "Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: “做好准备，阿贝拉德。咱们有场硬仗要打。”

languages.text: «Prepárese, Abelard. Tenemos una tarea ardua por delante».
languages.original_text: "Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: «Prepárese, Abelard. Tenemos una tarea ardua por delante».

languages.text: 「アベラルド、覚悟するんだ。この先には、かなりの試練が待ち構えている」
languages.original_text: "Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド、覚悟するんだ。この先には、かなりの試練が待ち構えている」

languages.text: "Rüstet Euch, Abelard. Uns steht eine Tortur bevor."
languages.original_text: "Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: "Rüstet Euch, Abelard. Uns steht eine Tortur bevor."

languages.text: « Préparez-vous, Abélard. C'est une rude épreuve qui nous attend. »
languages.original_text: "Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: « Préparez-vous, Abélard. C'est une rude épreuve qui nous attend. »

languages.text: "Hazır ol Abelard. Önümüzdeki engel çok büyük."
languages.original_text: "Get ready, Abelard. We have quite an ordeal ahead of us."
